plot: A short film about a father and daughter con artist team who cleverly deceive the unsuspecting patrons at a truckstop diner.
title: Incident at a Truckstop Diner
plot_es: A short film about a father and daughter con artist team who cleverly deceive the unsuspecting patrons at a truckstop diner.
plot_en: A short film about a father and daughter con artist team who cleverly deceive the unsuspecting patrons at a truckstop diner.
